name: pinterest_search
description: Search Pinterest pins by query. Navigates to Pinterest search and scrapes pin results including image URLs, titles, descriptions, and links.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query (e.g. 'home decor ideas', 'wedding dresses', 'healthy recipes')

steps.label: Wait for pin results to load

steps.code: const results = []; const pins = document.querySelectorAll('[data-test-id="pin"], [data-test-id="pinWrapper"], div[data-grid-item]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(pins.length, 20); i++) { const pin = pins[i]; const imgEl = pin.querySelector('img'); const linkEl = pin.querySelector('a[href*="/pin/"]'); const titleEl = pin.querySelector('[data-test-id="pinTitle"], [title]') || imgEl; const descEl = pin.querySelector('[data-test-id="truncated-description"], [data-test-id="pin-description"]'); results.push({ title: titleEl ? (titleEl.getAttribute('title') || titleEl.getAttribute('alt') || titleEl.textContent || '').trim().slice(0, 200) : '', image_url: imgEl ? (imgEl.getAttribute('src') || '') : '', pin_url: linkEl ? 'https://www.pinterest.com' + linkEl.getAttribute('href') : '', description: descEl ? descEl.textContent.trim().slice(0, 300) : '' }); } return { query: '{{query}}', result_count: results.length, results: results }
steps.name: search_results
steps.label: Extract pin search results
